players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "That's a lie! I'm the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He's the mafioso trying to frame me."
You: "Charlie is lying about being detective. I investigated him and he's mafioso. Diana, trust me - vote Charlie out."
Charlie: "I am the detective. Bob is lying. I investigated him, he is mafia. Diana, vote Bob with me to win."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
